item.description:
Harry Potter readers, your hour has come. The very awesome Jamie has offered to lead a discussion of JK Rowling's latest work. (Seriously, you'll love Jamie. She's more fun than a barrel of monkeys). The tentative date for this meetup is Aug 9, 7:30 at the Trident Bookstore on Newbury street. The intersection of Newbury & Mass Ave (it's accessible by the orange and green line, as well as street parking around Newbury street, with luck on your side).
But just so we don't ruffle some feathers if the winds change, the meetup MIGHT be moved to a later calendar date just to give members and newcombers time to pencil it into their schedules. We're all busy people, but bonding over Deathly Hallows is not to be missed.

And she's also not shy about giving her email address out. So, jamielynn603@yahoo.com if you need to drop her a line.
item.name: Harry Potter Meetup
